adding_experience_to_user_portfolio: {first_name} is adding an unverified experience to her profile
occupation_description: 👋 UX/UI Designer, passionate about sustainability and social impact

summary.title: Summary
summary.description: Each one of us can participate in solving social/environmental issues. It's not only about big deeds, but also small everyday contributions. I want to do so by bringing in my expertise in UX/UI design and passion for creative problem-solving... see more

company_one.name: {company_one_name}
company_one.description: During my brief but impactful tenure as a Visual Designer at {company_one_name}, I had the privilege of supporting the organization's crucial work in protecting and assisting refugees worldwide. Working alongside a diverse team of professionals, I applied my creative skills to develop visually compelling materials that communicated the organization's mission and... see more

education.name: {education_one_name}, {education_one_location}
education.description: During my undergraduate studies at Addis Ababa University, I pursued a Bachelor of Fine Arts degree with a specialization in Graphic Design. This comprehensive program provided me with a strong foundation in design principles, typography, visual communication, and creative problem-solving... see more

certificate_one.title: Interaction & UI/UX Design
certificate_one.description: This intensive online certification program offered by the Academy of Art University focused on UX design methodologies, user research techniques, wireframing, prototyping, and user testing. The course provided hands-on experience in designing user-centered digital experiences and equipped me with the necessary skills to create intuitive and engaging interfaces... see more

certificate_two.title: UX Design Certification
certificate_two.description: The UX Design Certification program offered by the Interaction Design Foundation equipped me with a deep understanding of user-centered design principles, user research methodologies, and interaction design. Through practical assignments and case studies, I gained expertise in creating intuitive and user-friendly digital experiences... see more

recommendation_one.name: {recommendation_one_name}
recommendation_one.description: I've seen {user_first_name}'s work for {company_one_name}, and it's clear she's got a real passion for what she does. Her designs are fresh and bold, truly capturing the spirit of the organization's mission. Can't wait to see what she does next!

recommendation_two.name: {recommendation_two_name}
recommendation_two.description: {user_first_name} is more than a designer; she is a storyteller weaving narratives through her designs, seamlessly incorporating our mission into her work and amplifying our voice. Her deep understanding of the aesthetic and functional aspects of design, combined with a remarkable dedication to our cause, has left an imprint that goes beyond the visuals; it echoes in the very soul of our organization. We've been lucky to have her on our team, and we can tell she's going to do great things in the future.

experience_description_details: e.g. I joined Stripe’s Customer Success team to help them scale their checkout product. I focused mainly on onboarding new customers and resolving complaints.

experience_job_details.title: {experience_job_title}
experience_job_details.description_one: As a passionate and driven UX/UI Designer at {company_one_name}, I played a pivotal role in crafting user-centered digital experiences aimed at raising awareness about the world's oceans and promoting sustainable practices. Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, I led the design and implementation of innovative solutions that engaged and educated users.
experience_job_details.description_two: As a passionate and driven Product Designer at {company_one_name}, I played a pivotal role in crafting user-centered digital experiences aimed at raising awareness about the world's oceans and promoting sustainable practices. Collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, I led the design and implementation of innovative solutions that engaged and educated... see more

title: Send verification request to external organization
description: {user_first_name} is sending a request to {company_one_name}, a non-existing organization on Socious, to verify her experience. She is sending an email to {company_one_hiring_manager_first_name}, CEO of {company_one_name} and her former supervisor.
verify_experience_description: {company_one_name} is not a registered organization. Confirm your information and send a request to verify your experience.
exact_info_button: I don’t remember my exact information
exact_description_two: Your employer will be requested to fill in these details.
email_content: Hi {company_one_hiring_manager_first_name}, Could you verify my experience working with you? Best regards, {user_first_name}

credentials.details: Here are all your credentials issued or requested.

education_verified.info: Umaya’s education at Addis Ababa University has been verified.

credential.vc_request_received: Umaya received VC request on Socious Wallet
credential.request_approved: Has approved your request and issued you a digital certificate. Claim now.
credential.blockchain_technology_info: Socious uses blockchain technology to make credentials transparent and traceable.
credential.claim_certificate_info: By claiming your certificate, you maintain full control and ownership of your credentials. You can easily share them with employers, educational institutions, or anyone else who requires proof of your qualifications directly from your digital wallet.

how_to_get_certificate.title: How to get your certificate
instructions: Accept the invitation to receive your certificate

credential.verification_check: Abebech Desta from Addis Ababa University is checking Umaya’s request on Socious.

credential_accepted.heading: Credential claimed
credential_accepted.info: Abebech Desta from Addis Ababa University is checking if Umaya has accepted her credential

identity_verification.request_certificates_info: You can now request digital certificates.
identity_verification.veriff_credential_sharing: Umaya shares her Veriff credential with Socious app
identity_verification.choose_credential: Choose the credential you would like to share:
identity_verification.confirm_information: Confirm the information below to send your request to Addis Ababa University.

send_verification_request.title: Send verification request to existing organization
send_verification_request.info: This means your achievements are transparent and verifiable by anyone. To make this work, we need to confirm you are the rightful owner of the credentials you're requesting. This verification helps prevent fraud and protects the value of your credentials. We leverage the power of digital ID technology to verify your identity without storing your personal details.
send_verification_request.steps: Go through the app’s onboarding process which will create a decentralized ID on Atala Prism. Verify your identity with Veriff, our KYC partner.

identity_verification.no_work_certificate: If there is no corresponding work certificate claimed. (this includes certificate statuses like: “pending”, “declined”, “withdrawn”, “issued” etc.
identity_verification.show_after_certificate_claimed: Show only after the certificate is claimed, after this, Umaya can’t edit (except description). Rationale, if Umaya edits the info, the modified info is not verified
identity_verification.request_pending_approval: The request is pending approval from OP (missing information or not when Umaya clicks “I don’t remember my exact information”)
identity_verification.work_certificate_issued: The work certificate has been issued and is claimable by Umaya
identity_verification.credential_revoked: The credential has been revoked (outside the scope for now)
identity_verification.approval_moves_to_issued_tab: Note: once a credential request is approved it moves to Issued tab
identity_verification.issued_credentials_archive: Note: only issued credentials can be moved to archive
identity_verification.op_request_pending: The request is pending approval from OP
identity_verification.credential_sent_to_umaya: The credential has been sent to Umaya

qr_code_check.check_instructions: To check scan the below QR code

certificate_authenticity.check: Here, Socious Wallet is checking two things: Whether the DID that issued the verifiable credential is on the Trust Registry (list of DIDs that are authorized to issue VCs) and that the Verifiable Credential is not tampered (not forged, not fake). If the two conditions above are satisfied, the wallet returns a message, “The certificate is authentic!”

proof_request_check.info: {user_first_name} is sharing their credential’s QR code.
proof_request_check.request: Sent you a request to check your credential as Product Designer with {company_one_name}
proof_request_check.connect_share_vc: {user_first_name} connects and shares VC on Wallet
proof_request_check.credential_sharing_info: You want to share a credential from {company_one_name}
proof_request_check.no_work_certificate_claimed: If there is no corresponding work certificate claimed. (this includes certificate statuses like: “pending”, “declined”, “withdrawn”, “issued” etc.)
proof_request_check.edit_restriction: Show only after the certificate is claimed, after this, {user_first_name} can’t edit (except description). Rationale, if {user_first_name} edits the info, the modified info is not verified.
